channel.title: Saving characters thru ftp !read please!
channel.description:
Ok i just wondering if someone could help me with following problem. i am trying to make worlds like real runescape, so what i need is server that save and load character files from ftp, thats mean other people could host my server and people could play in many worlds with same character, and if world1 will crash , people could play in world 2 etc.. so i wondering if someone could do this?? isnt that bad idea ?
thanx george

item.title: Saving characters thru ftp !read please!
item.dc:creator: @dococ dococ
item.description:
@dococ wrote:

Would take a while, but if your world/server crashed, just setup an auto-restarter.

Read full topic
